If your implementation is completely internal (it cannot reach the public Internet or GitHub) the Code Engine may be configured to listen for updates on an external IP address that it cannot reach. Since the webhook is invalid, the build process will never be triggered. To fix this, specify a valid Git location. The Code Engine uses the floating IP address allocated by the HPE Helion OpenStack Installation. If this IP is unreachable, the webhook cannot be created.
